metadata.title: CVE-2024-24784 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
The ParseAddressList function incorrectly handles comments (text withinparentheses) within display names. Since this is a misalignment withconforming address parsers, it can result in different trust decisionsbeing made by programs using different parsers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.22 - 1.22.5-1
golang-1.22-go - 1.22.5-1
golang-1.22-src - 1.22.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.22 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.22.5-1').
